insert into area ( id, code, name, pid, pcode, longitude, latitude, level_path, level, deep, user_id_create, user_id_modified, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{pid}, #{pcode}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{levelPath}, #{level}, #{deep}, #{userIdCreate}, #{userIdModified}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
